document_data.name: ''Sword of Sharpness''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''sword of sharpness''''' was a powerful [[magic item|magical]] [[sword]] that dealt devastating damage to its targets.
document_data.Description: Only certain types of swords could be enchanted to become ''swords of sharpness''; namely, those that slashed their targets rather than pierce them.
document_data.Powers:
Whenever a blow from a ''sword of sharpness'' connected with an object, it always dealt the maximum possible damage. Particularly precise hits not only dealt even more damage but also incurred a chance of severing a limb or part of the target's body.

In addition, the sword accepted a command word to start shining, illuminating a radius of {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}}. This property was deactivated once the command word was spoken again or if the sword was sheathed.
document_data.Notable ''Swords of Sharpness'': * [[Tearulai]], a sentient ''sword of sharpness''. By the {{YearlinkName|1492}},{{Waterdeep-time}} it was embedded in the skull of the [[green dragon]] [[Valdemar]], who inhabited the [[Wyllowwood]] level of [[Undermountain]].
document_data.Notable Owners: *[[Birdsong]]: A [[tabaxi]] [[bard]] from [[Chult]] in the late-15{{th}} century [[DR]].
